name: Teeth of My Mind (V. 0.15)
description:
--Alert! If I've used your graphical assets in the game and you would like me to give credit where credit is due in my future builds, please contact me! Otherwise, all music (aside from pre-packed MV placeholders) are my own compositions!--

Starting in a world of vague complication, a blue primordial slime is addressed by a disembodied voice.  After arming itself, the being that speaks to it offers a transformation to humanity. In lieu of this transformation,  a portal appears. Without any preempt, the slime turned human dives unknowingly into what will become a chain of lifetimes, each plagued with their own distortions and hardships. Who knows which choices affect which outcomes?
